title: From Shimano and Pinarello to SRAM and Scott: How Q36.5 Dialed in Tom Pidcock’s Transition to New Bikes
content:
'Tom knows what he wants': All the key changes behind Pidcock's new setup came together just weeks before his high-pressure season debut with Q36.5.

Read the full article at From Shimano and Pinarello to SRAM and Scott: How Q36.5 Dialed in Tom Pidcock’s Transition to New Bikes on Velo.
author: ahood
